ing: 1 cup uncooked glutinous white rice (sushi rice)
des: "Japanese sushi rice is the best tasting kind of rice.  Plus it's very usefull because it's so sticky. I use white or brown rice."
ins: In a saucepan, combine the water, salt, sugar and nori. Bring to a boil and add the rice. Cover, set heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes.
